article.headline: Mackinnon scores 16, Elon takes down Holy Cross 83-69
article.description: — Max Mackinnon had 16 points in Elon's 83-69 victory over Holy Cross on Saturday night.
article.linkText: Mackinnon scores 16, Elon takes down Holy Cross 83-69
article.story: ROCK HILL, S.C. -- — Max Mackinnon had 16 points in Elon's 83-69 victory over Holy Cross on Saturday night. Mackinnon also added five rebounds for the Phoenix (3-2). Zac Ervin scored 15 points and added five rebounds. TK Simpkins had 12 points and was 5 of 10 shooting, including 2 for 4 from 3-point range. Joseph Octave led the way for the Crusaders (1-4) with 16 points and eight rebounds. Will Batchelder added 11 points for Holy Cross. Caleb Kenney added eight points. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
